participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Creative and free-spirited, Arjun often challenges traditional norms yet holds a deep appreciation for his cultural roots.
participant_1.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, Lila seeks understanding and peace through her spiritual practices and meditation.
participant_2.background: i live in alaska. i'm a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i like meditation.
